trends: There have been 32 other sightings in London
There were no other sightings in London on or around October 20th 2007
divs: sighting detailshello my name is jeff i was driving my 2008 dodge avenger down hwy 401 on my way to london international airport. i had reach london and i had to drive back to a service station where i had gotten gas and forgotten to pay for it (note i did to return to pay after i realized what happened) on my way back to my hotel room where my gf and her mother where waiting for me to return. at approx. 10:30 pm to 11:00 pm eastern time i was driving to my hotel when i noticed a bright star in the sky. being i am a novice astronomer and the sky crystal clear i took note of the star thinking it was brighter than normal so i figured it was a planet, becuase at the time i believe venus was exceptionally visible by the human eye and telescope. so i continued thinking nothing of it until the star shot off like a bullet from a gun it was white with a tail behind it. when i noticed what the object had done i reacted with a combination of trepidation and amasment and being i was driving and 100 kmh\60 mph. and i had traffic behind me so i couldnt stop to take a real close look at the sky. after the object streaked across the sky the star was gone the whole event took less than a few seconds. also this may be entirely seperate and my perceptions being altered being i was under extreme stress from not paying the gass but as i was driving to the hotel from the service station the first time it only took 30 to 45 min to reach my hotel the first time when i drove back to the service station it took me an hour and a half to get to the staion though i travelled the same amount of distance and when i drove back to the hotel again an hour and 30 mins to return and i was driving faster on my return trip, aprox 110 to 115 kmh.
